Package es.ull.iis.simulation.core

The package that store the common Simulation objects.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Activity A task which requires certain amount and type of resources to be performed.
ActivityWorkGroup A WorkGroup which is used inside an Activity.
Debuggable Indicates that an object can print debug messages
Describable An object which contains a description.
Element An entity capable of creating simulation events.
ElementCreator  
ElementType The type of an element.
FlowDrivenActivity An Activity which could be carried out by an Element and whose duration depends on the finalization of an internal Flow.
FlowDrivenActivityWorkGroup  
Identifiable Indicates that an object have a unique identifier.
Resource A simulation resource whose availability is controlled by means of timetable entries.
ResourceType The type of a resource.
SimulationCycle A wrapper class for Cycle to be used inside a simulation.
SimulationObject An Identifiable object associated to a Simulation.
TimeDrivenActivity An Activity whose finalization is driven by a timestamp, i.e. the activity starts when there are enough resources and finishes after a period of time.
TimeDrivenActivityWorkGroup An ActivityWorkGroup which includes a duration when associated to a TimeDrivenActivity.
TimeDrivenGenerator A generator which creates Elements following a temporal pattern
VariableStore  
VariableStoreSimulationObject A simulation's object which can store variables.
WorkGroup A set of pairs <ResourceType, Integer> which defines how many resources from each type are required to do something (typically an Activity).
WorkItem A work item is an instance of an Element performing a SingleFlow.
 

Class Summary
Experiment Controls a set of simulation experiments.
Simulation Main simulation class, identified by means of an identifier and a description.
SimulationPeriodicCycle A wrapper class for PeriodicCycle to be used inside a simulation.
SimulationRoundedPeriodicCycle  
SimulationTableCycle A wrapper class for TableCycle to be used inside a simulation.
SimulationTimeFunction A wrapper class for TimeFunction.
SimulationWeeklyPeriodicCycle  
TimeStamp A timed value expressed as a pair <TimeUnit, long}>.
TimeTableEntry Represents the role that a resource plays at a specific time cycle.
 

Enum Summary
TimeDrivenActivity.Modifier Indicates special characteristics of this activity
TimeUnit Different time units that can be used in a simulation.
 

Package es.ull.iis.simulation.core Description

The package that store the common Simulation objects.
